definition: to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Double circuit transmission line is widely adopted in China owing to the demand of large-capacity power transmission.
sentences.chinese: 由於大容量輸電的需要，雙回線路在國內廣泛採用。

sentences.english: Nuclear reactors are net positive in terms of supporting the grid.
sentences.chinese: 在支持輸電網方面，核反應堆是正極。

sentences.english: Incredible as it seems, live high voltage transmission lines can be worked barehanded.
sentences.chinese: 令人難以置信的，帶電高壓輸電線路可以赤手操作。

sentences.english: A much smaller power loss occurs in the cable when energy is transmitted at high voltage.
sentences.chinese: 用高壓輸送電能時，沿輸電線的功率損耗小得多。

sentences.english: Commutation failure is one of the most common failures for the high voltage direct current transmission system .
sentences.chinese: 在特高壓直流輸電中換相失敗也是主要的故障。

sentences.english: Barometer readings are plotted on a pressure chart.
sentences.chinese: 高壓輸電線斷落，造成大面積停電。

sentences.english: This fact should be considered in the insulation design of HVDC transmission lines.
sentences.chinese: 這一事實在HVDC輸電線路的絕緣設計中必須考慮。

sentences.english: New filters are costless in operation when used in HVDC power transmission system.
sentences.chinese: 新濾波器用在高壓直流輸電系統中將節省運行成本。

sentences.english: Control and protect section is the most pivotal section in HVDC system.
sentences.chinese: 高壓直流輸電系統中最關鍵的部分是控制保護部分。

sentences.english: An open and effective management of power transmission networks is the requirement of an open electricity market.
sentences.chinese: 開放的電力市場需要輸電網開放和有效的管理。

sentences.english: The transmission tower is important structure equipment in the system of electric power.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要研究已腐蝕輸電杆塔的塗漆防護技術。

sentences.english: Two transmission lines in parallel are used more and more in bulk power systems.
sentences.chinese: 雙回平行輸電線路在大電力系統中使用越來越多。

sentences.english: Study on windage yaw discharge of transmission line.
sentences.chinese: 輸電線路風偏放電的影響因素研究。

sentences.english: The residual life prediction method for wind-induced transmission tower was proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出的風致輸電塔的剩餘壽命預測方法。

sentences.english: A transmission tower is a form of highly indeterminate space structures used extensively.
sentences.chinese: 輸電塔架是一種應用廣泛的高次超靜定空間結構。

sentences.english: The bird feces-proofing splinter is applied to deter line damage from birds in tradition.
sentences.chinese: 但許多鳥類又會給我們輸電線路帶來鳥害故障。

definition: interregional/spanning two or more PRC provinces

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Dian4 wang3 Gong1 si1

definition: environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
pinyin: huan2 jing4 ying3 xiang3 ping2 gu1
